issue.title: Desktop computer won't start
issue.description: Computer will not power on at all. Pressed power button multiple times with no response. Monitor shows no signal. Need urgent help as citizen appointments scheduled today.
issue.technical_details: No POST beep. No fan noise. Power LED on motherboard is off. Checked power cable connection - secure. Tried different power outlet - same issue.

resolution.notes: Replaced faulty power supply unit. System now boots normally. Verified all services running.
